name: C.M.L. - Broken Memories TRIAL VERSION
description:
"CML - Broken Memories"  is an adventure game made in RPG Maker, with puzzle elements. This is the “Trial Version”. I'm not sure yet if I will continue to develop, neither if the final product will be made in RPG Maker. The original idea was to be a point and click game.

C.M.L. is a series of comedy stories (created by me) that contains several characters. In this game the Protagonist is Tesla, a young tigress who wakes up in a padded room with no memory of how she get there.

Let me know if something was translated wrong.

(para quem baixou o jogo em português eu sei que tem alguns erros gramaticais... )
